<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Change Playlist Details"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/playlists/6LiYBpS5DE9PQEMDhYzHOc"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Change a playlist's name and public/private state. (The user must, of course, own the playlist.)

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **playlist-modify-public**, **playlist-modify-private**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string","example":"Updated playlist description"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"Namelezz"},"public":{"type":"boolean","example":false}}},"examples":{"Change Playlist Details":{"value":{"description":"Updated playlist description","name":"Namelezz","public":false}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
